item.title: LivIcons
item.dc:creator: progressivewp
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][heading type="1" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Features[/heading][vc_column_text]The following is a preview of appearance and behavior of LivIcons.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442289404{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2" align="text-left" style="title-box"]Any color, any size[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text]LivIcons are based on SVG (scalable vector graphic) in all modern browsers and on VML (Vector Markup Language) in IE6 - IE8. So these icons can be any size with good look at any devices. And, of course, any color can be applied too.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1413816260259{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][livicon livicon="rocket" color="#000000" size="16"][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left" font_size="12"]16 px[/special_text][livicon livicon="rocket" color="#037ac5" size="24"][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left" font_size="12"]24 px[/special_text][livicon livicon="rocket" color="#0098ca" size="32"][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left" font_size="12"]32 px[/special_text][livicon livicon="rocket" color="#738d00" size="48"][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left" font_size="12"]32 px[/special_text][livicon livicon="rocket" color="#f89406" size="56"][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left" font_size="12"]56 px[/special_text][livicon livicon="rocket" color="#c10841" size="64"][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left" font_size="12"]64 px[/special_text][livicon livicon="rocket" color="#ff5c00" size="96"][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left" font_size="12"]96 px[/special_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442299443{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Animated and static[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]The main feature is LivIcons are animated, but they can be static like any other icons too.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]We are animated![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1413816289778{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][livicon livicon="sun" color="#fda425" size="48"][livicon livicon="settings" color="#fda425" size="48"][livicon livicon="cloud-rain" color="#fda425" size="48"][livicon livicon="hand-up" color="#fda425" size="48"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]We are static.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1413816294214{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][livicon livicon="sitemap" icon_animation="no" color="#f89406" size="48"][livicon livicon="arrow-left" icon_animation="no" color="#f89406" size="48"][livicon livicon="facebook-alt" icon_animation="no" color="#f89406" size="48"][livicon livicon="info" icon_animation="no" color="#f89406" size="48"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442309240{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Click and hover events[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]LivIcons support two types of events: 'click' and 'hover'.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]We live on 'click'.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1413816297927{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][livicon livicon="star-half" icon_animation="yes" size="48" color="#0098ca" hover_color="#000000" event="click"][livicon livicon="info" icon_animation="yes" size="48" color="#0098ca" hover_color="#000000" event="click"][livicon livicon="ghost" icon_animation="yes" size="48" color="#0098ca" hover_color="#000000" event="click"][livicon livicon="help" icon_animation="yes" size="48" color="#0098ca" hover_color="#000000" event="click"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]We live on 'hover'.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1413816301575{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][livicon livicon="pacman" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" color="#048ce2" hover_color="#000000" size="48"][livicon livicon="hammer" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" color="#048ce2" hover_color="#000000" size="48"][livicon livicon="bug" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" color="#048ce2" hover_color="#000000" size="48"][livicon livicon="cloud-sun" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" color="#048ce2" hover_color="#000000" size="48"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442318482{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Looped animation[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]Animation can be repeated infinitely if appropriate.
Please don't get carried away with this option.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]Click to start/stop animations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1413816306795{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][livicon livicon="refresh" icon_animation="yes" event="click" color="#738d00" size="48" loop="yes"][livicon livicon="cloud-snow" icon_animation="yes" event="click" color="#738d00" size="48" loop="yes"][livicon livicon="tag" icon_animation="yes" event="click" color="#738d00" size="48" loop="yes"][livicon livicon="angle-double-up" icon_animation="yes" event="click" color="#738d00" size="48" loop="yes"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442326415{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Original colors by default[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]This option matches to different icons with traditional colors, such as browsers, social networks etc.
Note: Not animated from v1.1![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]Icons with 'original' colors.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1413816311575{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][livicon livicon="twitter" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" size="48"][livicon livicon="facebook-alt" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" size="48"][livicon livicon="chrome" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" size="48"][livicon livicon="ie" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" size="48"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442333922{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="1" align="text-left" style="title-box"]Shadowed[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]For webkit browsers you can apply css filter 'drop-shadow'.
Note: work in Chrome 18.0+, Safari 6.0+, iOS Safari 6.0+, Blackberry Browser 10.0+, Chrome for Android 25.0+[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]We have a shadow.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" el_class="text-centered" css=".vc_custom_1413816872162{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}"][livicon livicon="quote-right" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" color="#d40746" size="48"][livicon livicon="share" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" color="#d40746" size="48"][livicon livicon="warning" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" color="#d40746" size="48"][livicon livicon="signal" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" color="#d40746" size="48"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442341928{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Animation start with event on an icon or on its parent[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]You can trigger events 'click' or 'hover' on an icon itself or on its parent element. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]'Onparent' option.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1413822547935{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 10px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][button livicon="comments" size="btn-default" target="_blank" background="#037ac5" color="#ffffff" url="#" animate_on="parent"]On button[/button][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left"] [/special_text][button livicon="download" size="btn-default" target="_blank" url="#" animate_on="icon" background="#0098ca" color="#ffffff"]On icon[/button][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442358961{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Spinners[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]For spinner icons the special behavior is defined. If looped they work as traditional spinners.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]On this demo 'loop' is disabled. This is pseudo loop, just 10 iterations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1413898771910{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][livicon icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="10" shadow="no" livicon="spinner-one" size="32"][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left"]I'm looped[/special_text][livicon icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" shadow="no" livicon="spinner-two" size="32"][special_text tagname="span" font_weight="default" font="default" align="left"]I'm not[/special_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442367472{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Morphs[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]Morphs are a special category recomended to use as backgrounds for any desired block.
Note: Childs elements need absolute positioning.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]Morphs behavior is totaly different from other icons.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1413901765832{border-width: 1px !important;padding: 15px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}" el_class="text-centered"][livicon livicon="morph-o-s" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" shadow="no" color="#c10841" size="100"][livicon livicon="morph-s-c" icon_animation="yes" event="hover" loop="no" shadow="no" color="#01a5db" size="100"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][heading type="1" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Examples - where to use[/heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442383241{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2" style="title-box" align="text-left"]Call-to-action buttons[/heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][button animate_on="parent" size="btn-lg btn-block" target="_blank" align="text-left" url="#" livicon="leaf" background="#738d00" color="#ffffff"]Let's save the Planet together[/button][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][button animate_on="parent" size="btn-lg btn-block" target="_blank" align="text-left" url="#" livicon="piggybank" background="#0098ca" color="#ffffff"]Buy today with discount[/button][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][button animate_on="parent" size="btn-lg btn-block" target="_blank" align="text-left" url="#" livicon="upload" background="#c10841" color="#ffffff"]Upload now! It's totally safe![/button][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" css=".vc_custom_1422442396224{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][heading type="2"
